about_the_game:
Cops N' Zombies is an intense multiplayer horror social-oriented/deduction game. You and your team are to investigate a desolate map while one of your teammates is secretly a Zombie. The zombie player can transform at will and must use this to their advantage to kill all the police. The police can also find weapons and kill who they think are the zombie. How will you figure out who's who and who to trust?

Game Features

  • Play with your friends or meet new people in different servers!

  • Explore the map and find different guns to kill your teammates or the zombie!

  • Zombie can strategize and can act like a player to betray people or transform into a stronger melee zombie!

  • Earn Money each round and buy different equipment!

  • Proximity Voice chat to scream at your friends.

Game is still under development. Be sure to follow our Social Media for latest updates!

Join the discord for more updates!

content_descriptors.notes: Shooting Guns, Blood splatters, Scary Zombies, Jump Scares.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 8600k or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 11600k or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 or AMD RX 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: A horror social deduction game where you and your friends take on the roles of police officers on a critical mission. But there is a zombie among you that can transform at will. Can you trust your friends?
